GT.content: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)
GT.linkedContent: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)

GT.content: language as a phenomenon of gift-countergift, of giving-taking, of exchange, all difficulties of nomination/writing are difficulties of self-naming, self writing (se nommer, s’écrire)
GT.linkedContent: language as a phenomenon of gift-countergift, of giving-taking, of exchange, all difficulties of nomination/writing are difficulties of self-naming, self writing (se nommer, s’écrire)

GT.content: donner reviendrait à prendre et prendre à donner; this would fold itself over on language/writing beyond logocentric closure
GT.linkedContent: donner reviendrait à prendre et prendre à donner; this would fold itself over on language/writing beyond logocentric closure

GT.content: re: “Counterfeit Money,” what we’re saying about the (narrated) story also valid for (narrating) narrative > fold back on each other
GT.linkedContent: re: “Counterfeit Money,” what we’re saying about the (narrated) story also valid for (narrating) narrative > fold back on each other

PP.content: excess, displacement of series, n’est pas une simple sortie hors de la série (ce geste tombe sous une catégorie de la série), a folding back (repli), a re-mark, cannot name it with a single concept w/out being off the mark (sans le manquer): it is a real and necessary challenge that writes itself, and we must begin by reading it
PP.linkedContent: excess, displacement of series, n’est pas une simple sortie hors de la série (ce geste tombe sous une catégorie de la série), a folding back (repli), a re-mark, cannot name it with a single concept w/out being off the mark (sans le manquer): it is a real and necessary challenge that writes itself, and we must begin by reading it

LOBL.content: “crisscross double invagination,” chiasma btwn double invagination possible because of iterability of the mark (folds coming from both borders)
LOBL.linkedContent: “crisscross double invagination,” chiasma btwn double invagination possible because of iterability of the mark (folds coming from both borders)

LOBL.content: double invagination constitutes story of stories, narrative of deconstruction in deconstruction: apparently outer edge of a clôture, makes no sign beyond itself, toward tout autre, w/out becoming dual, being “represented,” refolded, re-marked w/in the clôture > what the structure produces as an effect of interiority, this structure-effect is being deconstructed
LOBL.linkedContent: double invagination constitutes story of stories, narrative of deconstruction in deconstruction: apparently outer edge of a clôture, makes no sign beyond itself, toward tout autre, w/out becoming dual, being “represented,” refolded, re-marked w/in the clôture > what the structure produces as an effect of interiority, this structure-effect is being deconstructed

PAS.content: what does one know of force of de-distancing? and if the custody (garde) of knowledge is distanced? word knowledge would be refolded, re-employed > Blanchot’s reploiement formidable
PAS.linkedContent: what does one know of force of de-distancing? and if the custody (garde) of knowledge is distanced? word knowledge would be refolded, re-employed > Blanchot’s reploiement formidable

PAS.content: Blanchot’s folding displaces typical opposition, hierarchy, value of value
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot’s folding displaces typical opposition, hierarchy, value of value

VP.content: w/ ideal and pure freedom of re-presentation and reflection (essence of every lived-experience), Husserl thinks presence as constituted by fold of the return
VP.linkedContent: w/ ideal and pure freedom of re-presentation and reflection (essence of every lived-experience), Husserl thinks presence as constituted by fold of the return

F.content: “conservative” repression installs in the unconscious what the Self treats as an exquisite corpse, a “surrealism” of folded sentences loses its creases, the paper flattens out, and there is a spot (lieu) of pleasure disguised as pain, which the therapist must exhume
F.linkedContent: “conservative” repression installs in the unconscious what the Self treats as an exquisite corpse, a “surrealism” of folded sentences loses its creases, the paper flattens out, and there is a spot (lieu) of pleasure disguised as pain, which the therapist must exhume

POOF.content: the irreducible dissymmetry btwn hypothesis of shared friendship & idea that love can (must) survive the friend’s death—a doubling fold: friend bears our proper death, expropriates it, he bears my death & inherits it as the last survivor
POOF.linkedContent: the irreducible dissymmetry btwn hypothesis of shared friendship & idea that love can (must) survive the friend’s death—a doubling fold: friend bears our proper death, expropriates it, he bears my death & inherits it as the last survivor

POOF.content: the all too of Human All Too Human, a rolling wave, a trembling, enveloped violence of a welling up wave falling back on itself, “when the excess of the beyond itself folds back into immanence,” turning around, coming to perhaps
POOF.linkedContent: the all too of Human All Too Human, a rolling wave, a trembling, enveloped violence of a welling up wave falling back on itself, “when the excess of the beyond itself folds back into immanence,” turning around, coming to perhaps

POOF.content: every instant begins at the end, address carries in its readability the signature of the addressee: it withdraws from space by penetrating it
POOF.linkedContent: every instant begins at the end, address carries in its readability the signature of the addressee: it withdraws from space by penetrating it

POOF.content: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”
POOF.linkedContent: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”

POOF.content: Derrida has insisted that the indefinite recoils (replis) in Zarathustra’s strategy must contain one fold or another that places history of brother in Bible & Koran beside Zarathustra (not in confrontation)
POOF.linkedContent: Derrida has insisted that the indefinite recoils (replis) in Zarathustra’s strategy must contain one fold or another that places history of brother in Bible & Koran beside Zarathustra (not in confrontation)

DS.content: double session finds its corner (coin) BTWN (ENTRE) literature & truth (that by which question “what is?” wants answering): figure of folding back, angle ensured by fold
DS.linkedContent: double session finds its corner (coin) BTWN (ENTRE) literature & truth (that by which question “what is?” wants answering): figure of folding back, angle ensured by fold

DS.content: indefinite fold of word appearance (presence, simulacrum)
DS.linkedContent: indefinite fold of word appearance (presence, simulacrum)

DS.content: double session has no middle, divided in 2 through fiction of a crease (du faux pli)
DS.linkedContent: double session has no middle, divided in 2 through fiction of a crease (du faux pli)

DS.content: necessity of folding (page of the hymen) not a secondary procedure, no smooth fold, hymen doesn’t simply adopt some fold > fold, in the lining which, of itself, the hymen was, at once its outside and its inside, no proper name, doesn’t exist: hymen, already torn, in the fold
DS.linkedContent: necessity of folding (page of the hymen) not a secondary procedure, no smooth fold, hymen doesn’t simply adopt some fold > fold, in the lining which, of itself, the hymen was, at once its outside and its inside, no proper name, doesn’t exist: hymen, already torn, in the fold

DS.content: in the morgue you’ve been able to read the folding (vous aurez pu lire que la pliure)
DS.linkedContent: in the morgue you’ve been able to read the folding (vous aurez pu lire que la pliure)

DS.content: “re-presentation” [Derrida via Mallarmé]: less concerned with setting forth things, the image of things, than setting up a machine > repetition-toward-itself of text as re-folding
DS.linkedContent: “re-presentation” [Derrida via Mallarmé]: less concerned with setting forth things, the image of things, than setting up a machine > repetition-toward-itself of text as re-folding

DS.content: fold, crisscrossed groove (sillon croisé), turns whole into “too much,” “too little”
DS.linkedContent: fold, crisscrossed groove (sillon croisé), turns whole into “too much,” “too little”

DS.content: sum can’t be totalized, nor is this non-totalizing exceeded by infinite richness of content of meaning or intention > define the limit otherwise: fold w/ no possibility of folding text back on itself (angle & intersection of re-mark), no reduction of its spacing > blank, fold: impossibility of (imaginary) theme beyond textual instance > these textual effects rich w/ kind of poverty, singular/regular monotony, disappear: one can’t see this because one thinks one is seeing themes
DS.linkedContent: sum can’t be totalized, nor is this non-totalizing exceeded by infinite richness of content of meaning or intention > define the limit otherwise: fold w/ no possibility of folding text back on itself (angle & intersection of re-mark), no reduction of its spacing > blank, fold: impossibility of (imaginary) theme beyond textual instance > these textual effects rich w/ kind of poverty, singular/regular monotony, disappear: one can’t see this because one thinks one is seeing themes

DS.content: tropic twist of fan (éventail) (wings, plumes) inscribes very movement of structure of fan-as-text (surplus-mark, margin of meaning), spacing, fold, hymen btwn all meaning-effects > this supplementary valence/mark neither metaphor nor metonymy, no transcendental privilege
DS.linkedContent: tropic twist of fan (éventail) (wings, plumes) inscribes very movement of structure of fan-as-text (surplus-mark, margin of meaning), spacing, fold, hymen btwn all meaning-effects > this supplementary valence/mark neither metaphor nor metonymy, no transcendental privilege

DS.content: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it > le pli (se) plie: son sens s’espace d’une double marque, au creux de laquelle un blanc se plie
DS.linkedContent: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it > le pli (se) plie: son sens s’espace d’une double marque, au creux de laquelle un blanc se plie

DS.content: “the masculine is turned back on the feminine: whole adventure of sexual difference” > in same blow: fold ruptures virginity it marks as virginity, folding over its secret > nothing more virginal (and at same time) more purloined/penetrated than secret (loses smooth simplicity of its surface)
DS.linkedContent: “the masculine is turned back on the feminine: whole adventure of sexual difference” > in same blow: fold ruptures virginity it marks as virginity, folding over its secret > nothing more virginal (and at same time) more purloined/penetrated than secret (loses smooth simplicity of its surface)

DS.content: the rape has already taken place and will nevertheless never have been perpetrated > caught in folds of veil: where all truth comes undone
DS.linkedContent: the rape has already taken place and will nevertheless never have been perpetrated > caught in folds of veil: where all truth comes undone

DS.content: fold, multi-pli-cations (folders, foldouts, etc.)—ploys (all the figures) & the re-mark of the fold-upon-itself of writing (again)
DS.linkedContent: fold, multi-pli-cations (folders, foldouts, etc.)—ploys (all the figures) & the re-mark of the fold-upon-itself of writing (again)

DS.content: but the fold is not a form of reflexivity (Hegel’s sublation)
DS.linkedContent: but the fold is not a form of reflexivity (Hegel’s sublation)

DS.content: if fold had a limit somewhere, if mark, margin, or marche (limit, threshold, border) was fold’s other > there would be no text
DS.linkedContent: if fold had a limit somewhere, if mark, margin, or marche (limit, threshold, border) was fold’s other > there would be no text

SP.content: “question of style” always concerned w/ weight (le pesant) of pointy object (stiletto, stylus, rapier, quill), which attacks matter/matrix, leaving a mark
SP.linkedContent: “question of style” always concerned w/ weight (le pesant) of pointy object (stiletto, stylus, rapier, quill), which attacks matter/matrix, leaving a mark

SP.content: also the protection against this threat, se pliant alors ou repliant, en fuite, derrière des voiles
SP.linkedContent: also the protection against this threat, se pliant alors ou repliant, en fuite, derrière des voiles

ATIA.content: transgressal experience of limitrophy, trephō, trophē, trophos: to feed limit, train, nurse, make grow, thicken, fold, divide the line, multiply/increase limit’s figures [not efface the limit]
ATIA.linkedContent: transgressal experience of limitrophy, trephō, trophē, trophos: to feed limit, train, nurse, make grow, thicken, fold, divide the line, multiply/increase limit’s figures [not efface the limit]

O.content: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding (re-ploiement)
O.linkedContent: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding (re-ploiement)

WAP.content: figure of fold, explicitation, complication, often imposes itself on us > not incompatible w/ circular band or invagination [re: right to teaching assumes knowledge/teaching of right][cf. 197n “chiasmatic invagination of borders”]
WAP.linkedContent: figure of fold, explicitation, complication, often imposes itself on us > not incompatible w/ circular band or invagination [re: right to teaching assumes knowledge/teaching of right][cf. 197n “chiasmatic invagination of borders”]

RGE.content: general economy does not overturn but comprehends (not by way of knowledge-gathering but by inscribing w/in its opening) absolute knowledge, folds its figures into nonbasis of expenditure, relates them to destruction of value > atheology, a-teleology, aneschatology
RGE.linkedContent: general economy does not overturn but comprehends (not by way of knowledge-gathering but by inscribing w/in its opening) absolute knowledge, folds its figures into nonbasis of expenditure, relates them to destruction of value > atheology, a-teleology, aneschatology

Gii.content: Heidegger’s unity [re: Geschlecht], not identity, but preserves the simplicity of the same—even in the form of the fold
Gii.linkedContent: Heidegger’s unity [re: Geschlecht], not identity, but preserves the simplicity of the same—even in the form of the fold

DST.content: necessity of rhythm: necessity of a scansion that comes to fold & unfold thought
DST.linkedContent: necessity of rhythm: necessity of a scansion that comes to fold & unfold thought

DST.content: fold or abyssal redoubling: désistance is first of all the désistance of truth: truth never resembles itself, so it resembles mimesis
DST.linkedContent: fold or abyssal redoubling: désistance is first of all the désistance of truth: truth never resembles itself, so it resembles mimesis

RM.content: re-trait of metaphor > gives rise to an abyssal generalization of metaphor > trait has internal multiplicity, la structure pliée-repliée d’un re-trait > opens out the borders or invaginates them
RM.linkedContent: re-trait of metaphor > gives rise to an abyssal generalization of metaphor > trait has internal multiplicity, la structure pliée-repliée d’un re-trait > opens out the borders or invaginates them

EJQB.content: pli douloureux de soi (painful folding of itself) par lequel l’histoire se réfléchit elle-même en se donnant le chiffre
EJQB.linkedContent: pli douloureux de soi (painful folding of itself) par lequel l’histoire se réfléchit elle-même en se donnant le chiffre

EJQB.content: history: the only thing that begins by reflecting itself > this fold, this furrow (ride), is the Jew
EJQB.linkedContent: history: the only thing that begins by reflecting itself > this fold, this furrow (ride), is the Jew

PJP.content: anacoluthon, generalized, causes all “subjects” to tremble (disturbance of identification), passes border btwn fiction/reality, btwn literature/testimony > even if erases border still a highly significant structural field: the duel of friendship, the question of “us”
PJP.linkedContent: anacoluthon, generalized, causes all “subjects” to tremble (disturbance of identification), passes border btwn fiction/reality, btwn literature/testimony > even if erases border still a highly significant structural field: the duel of friendship, the question of “us”

PJP.content: anacoluthic catastrophe finds one of its privileged places in fold where the guilty accuses the witness, makes him bear responsibility for the offense
PJP.linkedContent: anacoluthic catastrophe finds one of its privileged places in fold where the guilty accuses the witness, makes him bear responsibility for the offense

D.content: by a folding-back (reploiement) or internal angle of surface: face (frons scaenae) contemplates itself as unconditioned opening of appearance, but explains itself as surface-effect, as conditioned [by square apparatus]
D.linkedContent: by a folding-back (reploiement) or internal angle of surface: face (frons scaenae) contemplates itself as unconditioned opening of appearance, but explains itself as surface-effect, as conditioned [by square apparatus]

D.content: present can only present itself by relating back to itself [folding back on itself], (com)plying with itself (en se pliant à soi) dans l’angle, along la brisure: a “crack (faille)” created by a joint, hinge
D.linkedContent: present can only present itself by relating back to itself [folding back on itself], (com)plying with itself (en se pliant à soi) dans l’angle, along la brisure: a “crack (faille)” created by a joint, hinge

D.content: possibility (potency) of present is its own limit, inner fold, impossibility—its impotence (btwn presence/castration) > same goes for “history,” “form”: language of metaphysics
D.linkedContent: possibility (potency) of present is its own limit, inner fold, impossibility—its impotence (btwn presence/castration) > same goes for “history,” “form”: language of metaphysics

TN.content: Nancy’s partes extra partes, everything outside another outside; p. 14 fold of becoming-inside of the first outside, nothing but surfaces & outsides w/out insides: superficies of surfaces are limits, exposed to a touch that can only leave them intact, untouchable > irreducible disseminal divisibility
TN.linkedContent: Nancy’s partes extra partes, everything outside another outside; p. 14 fold of becoming-inside of the first outside, nothing but surfaces & outsides w/out insides: superficies of surfaces are limits, exposed to a touch that can only leave them intact, untouchable > irreducible disseminal divisibility

TN.content: self-relation, “s’efforcer” > institutes/born to itself as exertion moment when limit insists, resists > efforcement as effort/limit, a finite force s’arrête, and se replie toward itself depuis sa fin
TN.linkedContent: self-relation, “s’efforcer” > institutes/born to itself as exertion moment when limit insists, resists > efforcement as effort/limit, a finite force s’arrête, and se replie toward itself depuis sa fin

TN.content: the “self” is as indispensable as you in se toucher toi, an “I” unable to touch itself couldn't se plier à ce qui le déplie absolument, au tout autre qui, comme tout autre, habite mon coeur en étranger > no anthropological limit here > “divine,” “animal,” & life all derivative of se toucher toi
TN.linkedContent: the “self” is as indispensable as you in se toucher toi, an “I” unable to touch itself couldn't se plier à ce qui le déplie absolument, au tout autre qui, comme tout autre, habite mon coeur en étranger > no anthropological limit here > “divine,” “animal,” & life all derivative of se toucher toi

ATM.content: for Levinas, logos is not secondary/instrumental, it remains indispensable as fold (pli) that bends (se plie) to the gift, as the tongue (langue) of my mouth when I tear bread from it to give it to the other > it is also my body
ATM.linkedContent: for Levinas, logos is not secondary/instrumental, it remains indispensable as fold (pli) that bends (se plie) to the gift, as the tongue (langue) of my mouth when I tear bread from it to give it to the other > it is also my body

AFR.content: for Condillac, there is no difference in general, only of degrees > this proposition comes to unfold (déplier) all concepts of rupture/repetition, this unfolding is time’s
AFR.linkedContent: for Condillac, there is no difference in general, only of degrees > this proposition comes to unfold (déplier) all concepts of rupture/repetition, this unfolding is time’s

E.content: the fold of mimesis at origin of pure productivity: a gift for itself (pour soi) of God who makes a present of himself to himself
E.linkedContent: the fold of mimesis at origin of pure productivity: a gift for itself (pour soi) of God who makes a present of himself to himself

LG.content: edge (bord), borderline (ligne de bordure), overflowing (débordement) do not arise w/out a fold—which figure of folding? [the answer: double chiasmatic invagination]
LG.linkedContent: edge (bord), borderline (ligne de bordure), overflowing (débordement) do not arise w/out a fold—which figure of folding? [the answer: double chiasmatic invagination]

OG.content: image is death, it cannot represent & add representer to represented, thus presence of re-presented folded back on itself in the world, presence announces its dispossession w/in its own representer/death > subject: merely this movement of expropriation
OG.linkedContent: image is death, it cannot represent & add representer to represented, thus presence of re-presented folded back on itself in the world, presence announces its dispossession w/in its own representer/death > subject: merely this movement of expropriation

ATAP.content: [apocalypse w/out apocalypse] X w/out X, sans marks internal/external catastrophe of apocalypse, catastrophe of sans doesn’t merge w/ announced end, is its pli: a closure w/out end, end w/out end > outside of apocalypse w/in apocalypse
ATAP.linkedContent: [apocalypse w/out apocalypse] X w/out X, sans marks internal/external catastrophe of apocalypse, catastrophe of sans doesn’t merge w/ announced end, is its pli: a closure w/out end, end w/out end > outside of apocalypse w/in apocalypse

ATAP.content: “do not seal”: i.e. do not close, do not sign
ATAP.linkedContent: “do not seal”: i.e. do not close, do not sign

SPEC.content: repetition, reproductivity, works w/out saying anything, like death drive, not even “form,” w/out thesis, de-monstration makes its proof (preuve) sans montrer > de-monstration folds into everything it makes explicit, pas de démonstration remains (reste) in this restance
SPEC.linkedContent: repetition, reproductivity, works w/out saying anything, like death drive, not even “form,” w/out thesis, de-monstration makes its proof (preuve) sans montrer > de-monstration folds into everything it makes explicit, pas de démonstration remains (reste) in this restance
